title: Well, that's interesting. (New versions of Gentium!)
content: Still in Beta, but there's now a Gentium Basic and Gentium Book Basic available with true bold and bold italic versions. They lack, at this point, much of the huge range of characters, but even so...
author: metalfoot

comments.content: Very cool! I love Gentium. Bold is certainly helpful. Would be fabulous with old style figures. :+)
And as of yesterday, the full releases of [Gentium Basic](http://web.archive.org/web/20120718005751/http:/scripts.sil.org/Gentium_basic) are now available.

Victor Gaultney is relieved to have it done. Congrats, Victor!

ChrisL
Well, not quite done, I'm sure. But done to this stage.
